name: Spardyr Reimagined: Detention Imminent
description:
This game was made in less than 72 hours as part of a competition between me and Work_Smarter. I decided to make a reimagined version of his first game, Spardyr.

This game is an arcade-style top-down shooter where you shoot brains at your bad grades. There are five different enemy types, each with different stats.  Post your high scores in the comments!

This game marks the first release of Xepherfae Development. Enjoy!
